title: Nicaragua proposes suspending Vatican ties after comments
description: Nicaragua ’s government says it has proposed suspending relations with the Vatican days after Pope Francis compared President Daniel Ortega’s administration to a communist or Nazi dictatorship amid a crackdown on the Catholic Church in the country

title: At least 8 dead as suspected human smuggling boats capsize off San Diego
description: An official calls the capsizing of two fishing boats off San Diego's coast ‘one of the worst maritime smuggling tragedies that I can think of in California.’

title: China plays Middle East peacemaker in U.S.’s shadow
description: Beijing stepped into what could be seen as a geopolitical vacuum in the Middle East, becoming a mediator in Saudi Arabia and Iran relations after a seven-year deep freeze.

title: At least 19 people killed in Congo by suspected extremists
description: Authorities say rebels in eastern Congo killed at least 19 people and set fire to a health fire and houses

title: Government: Gunmen in north Nigeria kill at least 16 people
description: The government in Nigeria says gunmen killed at least 16 people during an attack in the country’s northwest

title: Iran says deal with Saudi Arabia will help end Yemen's war
description: Iran’s mission to the United Nations says a breakthrough agreement with Saudi Arabia restoring bilateral relations will help bring a political settlement to Yemen’s yearslong war

title: North Macedonia: 3 migrants and suspected smuggler injured
description: Police in North Macedonia say three migrants and a suspected smuggler were seriously injured when a car that police were pursuing overturned

title: Iran's top diplomat claims prisoner swap near with US
description: Iran’s top diplomat claims a prisoner swap is near with the U.S., though he has offered no evidence to support his assertion

title: South African rapper Costa Titch dies after performing at music festival
description: Unverified videos appeared to show Constantinos Tsobanoglou, also known as Costa Titch, collapsing while performing at the Ultra Music Festival in Johannesburg. He was 28.

title: Iraqi PM promises action to tackle crippling climate change
description: Iraq’s prime minister has promised sweeping measures to tackle climate change, which has affected millions across the country

title: Pope Francis at 10 years: He has made his mark, but early hope has faded
description: Within the Catholic Church over the past decade, conservative opposition to Pope Francis has intensified, while many on the left say he hasn't done enough.

title: German airport strikes force hundreds of flight cancellations
description: About 27,000 passengers will be affected in Berlin by strikes that will also impact cities like Hamburg and Bremen. Lufthansa expects “massive disruptions.”

title: China and Australia are starting to get along. Will AUKUS torpedo it?
description: The leaders of Australia, the U.K. and the U.S. are set to reveal details of a plan to supply Australia with nuclear-powered submarines. China isn't happy.

title: Defending Ukraine’s ‘highway of life’ — the last road out of Bakhmut
description: Thousands of Ukrainian soldiers fighting in the war's fiercest battle depend on the one viable road running west out of besieged city. And Russian fighters are drawing closer.

title: Israeli forces kill 3 Palestinian gunmen in West Bank
description: Israeli forces fatally shot three Palestinian gunmen who opened fire on troops in the occupied West Bank

title: Argentina's initial fervor for Pope Francis has faded
description: When Jorge Bergoglio of Argentina became Pope Francis, much of his home country celebrated as if it had just won a soccer World Cup championship

title: Syrian state media: Israel fires missiles at western city
description: Syria’s state news agency says Israeli missiles have targeted a western city wounding three soldiers

title: Ukraine live briefing: Ukraine presses Pentagon for air defenses; battle for Bakhmut rages on
description: The head of Ukraine’s armed forces renewed Kyiv’s call for better air defenses in a telephone call with the Pentagon’s top general, Mark A. Milley.
